src_original: dāruṇena sarpeṇa daṣṭasya nāmaṃ grahāya saptābhimantritamudakacūrṇakaṃ pānāya deyam /  mṛto 'pyuttiṣṭhati /
tgt_original: 若人被惡毒蛇所螫臨死之時。 呪師以自手掬取水。 漱口七遍誦呪。

src_original: stanagaṇḍikāyāṃ saptābhimantritayā mṛttikayā lepayet /  mucyati /  vedanā na bhavati /
tgt_original: 和泥塗於瘡上二十一遍并呪即差。

src_original: māryupadrave nagaramadhye vā ardharātrau sthaṇḍilakamupalipya śuklaṃ baliṃ kṛtvā kṣīravṛkṣasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya kṣīrāhutisahasraṃ juhuyāt
tgt_original: 又若畜生遇時氣病者。 於城正中央然穀樹火。

src_original: tato 'nyatamasmin divase madhyāhnavelāyāṃ śleṣmātakasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya siddhārthānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt /
tgt_original: 夜裏應作此法。 其明日午時還燒穀樹火。
